member.summary:
Gets or sets the background (paper) color for the generated images.
The default value is .

remarks.para: When rendering pages of a document that specifies its own background color, then the document background color will override the color specified by this property.

member.name: P:Aspose.Words.Saving.ImageSaveOptions.PixelFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the pixel format for the generated images.

remarks.p: The default value is .
Pixel format of the output image may differ from the set value because of work of GDI+.

member.name: P:Aspose.Words.Saving.ImageSaveOptions.Resolution
member.summary: Gets or sets the resolution for the generated images, in dots per inch.

remarks.para: This property has effect only when saving to raster image formats.
remarks.p: The default value is 96.

member.name: P:Aspose.Words.Saving.ImageSaveOptions.JpegQuality
member.summary: Gets or sets a value determining the quality of the generated JPEG images.

remarks.para: Has effect only when saving to JPEG.
remarks.p: Use this property to get or set the quality of generated images when saving in JPEG format. The value may vary from 0 to 100 where 0 means worst quality but maximum compression and 100 means best quality but minimum compression.
The default value is 95.

member.name: P:Aspose.Words.Saving.ImageSaveOptions.TiffCompression
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of compression to apply when saving generated images to the TIFF format.

remarks.para: Has effect only when saving to TIFF.
remarks.p: The default value is .

member.name: P:Aspose.Words.Saving.ImageSaveOptions.ImageColorMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the color mode for the generated images.

remarks.para: This property has effect only when saving to raster image formats.
The default value is .

member.name: P:Aspose.Words.Saving.ImageSaveOptions.ImageBrightness
member.summary: Gets or sets the brightness for the generated images.

remarks.para: This property has effect only when saving to raster image formats.
The default value is 0.5. The value must be in the range between 0 and 1.

member.name: P:Aspose.Words.Saving.ImageSaveOptions.ImageContrast
member.summary: Gets or sets the contrast for the generated images.

remarks.para: This property has effect only when saving to raster image formats.
The default value is 0.5. The value must be in the range between 0 and 1.

member.name: P:Aspose.Words.Saving.ImageSaveOptions.Scale
member.summary: Gets or sets the zoom factor for the generated images.
member.remarks: The default value is 1.0. The value must be greater than 0.

member.name: P:Aspose.Words.Saving.ImageSaveOptions.MetafileRenderingOptions
member.summary: Allows to specify how metafiles are treated in the rendered output.

remarks.para: When is specified, Aspose.Words renders metafile to vector graphics using its own metafile rendering engine first and then renders vector graphics to the image.
When is specified, Aspose.Words renders metafile directly to the image using the GDI+ metafile rendering engine.

GDI+ metafile rendering engine works faster, supports almost all metafile features but on low resolutions may produce inconsistent result when compared to the rest of vector graphics (especially for text) on the page. Aspose.Words metafile rendering engine will produce more consistent result even on low resolutions but works slower and may inaccurately render complex metafiles.
The default value for is .

member.name: P:Aspose.Words.Saving.ImageSaveOptions.NumeralFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets used for rendering of numerals. European numerals are used by default.

member.name: P:Aspose.Words.Saving.ImageSaveOptions.TiffBinarizationMethod
member.summary: Gets or sets method used while converting images to 1 bpp format when is SaveFormat.Tiff and is equal to TiffCompression.Ccitt3 or TiffCompression.Ccitt4.

remarks.para: The default value is ImageBinarizationMethod.Threshold.

summary.para: The Aspose.Words.Rendering namespace provides classes that allow to customize printing or rendering of documents.

member.name: T:Aspose.Words.Saving.PdfCompliance
member.summary: Specifies the PDF standards compliance level.

member.name: F:Aspose.Words.Saving.PdfCompliance.Pdf15
member.summary: The output file will comply with the PDF 1.5 standard.

member.name: F:Aspose.Words.Saving.PdfCompliance.PdfA1a
member.summary: The output file will comply with the PDF/A-1a standard. This level includes all the requirements of PDF/A-1b and additionally requires that document structure be included (also known as being "tagged"), with the objective of ensuring that document content can be searched and repurposed.
member.remarks: Note that exporting the document structure significantly increases the memory consumption, especially for the large documents.

member.name: F:Aspose.Words.Saving.PdfCompliance.PdfA1b
member.summary: The output file will comply with the PDF/A-1b standard. PDF/A-1b has the objective of ensuring reliable reproduction of the visual appearance of the document.

member.name: F:Aspose.Words.Saving.PdfTextCompression.Flate
member.summary: Flate (ZIP) compression.

member.name: T:Aspose.Words.Rendering.AsposeWordsPrintDocument
member.summary: Provides a default implementation for printing of a within the .NET printing framework.

remarks.para: overrides to print the range of pages that is specified in .

A single Word document can consist of multiple sections that specify pages with different sizes, orientation and paper trays. overrides to properly select paper size, orientation and paper source when printing a Word document.

Microsoft Word stores printer specific values for paper trays in a Word document and therefore, only printing on the same printer model as the one that was selected when the user specified the paper trays will result in printing from the correct trays. If you print a document on a different printer, then most likely the default paper tray will be used, not the trays specified in the document.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of this class.
member.param: The document to print.

summary.p: The Aspose.Words namespace provides classes for generating, converting, modifying, rendering and printing Microsoft Word documents without utilizing Microsoft Word.
Aspose.Words is written completely in C#, CLS compliant and contains only safe managed code. Microsoft Word is not required in order to use Aspose.Words.

The classes in the Aspose.Words namespace borrow best practices from two well-known frameworks: Microsoft Word Automation and System.Xml. A document in Aspose.Words is represented by a tree of nodes, much like in XML DOM. Where possible, class, method and property names match those found in Microsoft Word Automation.
The main classes in this namespace are:

list.item: is the main class of the object model that represents a Microsoft Word document.
provides an easy way to insert content and formatting into a document.
is the base class for all nodes in the document.
is the base class for all nodes of the document that can contain other nodes, for example , and .
